00071 /*
00072  *      BASIC DATA TYPES 
00073  */
00074 typedef char Boolean;
00075 typedef int Integer;
00076 typedef float Float;
00077 typedef double Double;
00078 typedef char String;
00079 typedef void *Pointer;
00080 typedef long (*Function) (char *, ...); /* a function returning void */
00081 typedef char C_Boolean;         /* boolean value */
00082 typedef ITintmax C_Integer;     /* make sure can contain Pointer */
00083 typedef float C_Float;          /* single-precision floating-point numbers */
00084 typedef double C_Double;        /* double-precision floating-point numbers */
00085 typedef void *C_Pointer;        /* general purpose pointer */
00086 typedef char *C_String;         /* character string */
00087 typedef long (*C_Function) (char *, ...);       /* a function returning void */
00088 
00089 typedef C_Boolean *Cb;          /* boolean array */
00090 typedef C_Integer *Ci;          /* integer array */
00091 typedef C_Float *Cf;            /* float array */
00092 typedef C_Double *Cd;           /* double array */
00093 
00094 #define C_TYPE_VOID     0       /* a multiple-type data holder */
00095 #define C_TYPE_INTEGER  1
00096 #define C_TYPE_FLOAT    2
00097 #define C_TYPE_DOUBLE   3
00098 #define C_TYPE_POINTER  4
00099 
00100 typedef union
00101 {
00102   C_Boolean b;
00103   C_Integer i;
00104   C_Float f;
00105   C_Double d;
00106   C_Pointer p;
00107 }
00108 C_Data;

00110 #define C_TRUE                  1       /* true boolean value */
00111 #define C_FALSE                 0       /* false boolean value */
00112 
00113 #define C_ALL_ONE               0xFFFFFFFF
00114 
00115 #define C_NIL                   0       /* nil pointer/index */
00116 
00117 #define C_SUCCESS               1
00118 #define C_FAILURE               0       /* status of a function call */
00119 #define C_BAD_INDEX             -1      /* illegal index */
00120

00122 #define C_INT_MAX               +2147483647L
00123 
00124 #define C_FLOAT_DIG             6       /* decimal digits of precision */
00125 #define C_FLOAT_EPSILON         1E-5    /* smallest number X s.t. 1+X<>X */
00126 #define C_FLOAT_MAX             1E+37
00127 #define C_FLOAT_MIN             1E-37
00128 
00129 #define C_DOUBLE_DIG            9       /* decimal digits of precision */
00130 #define C_DOUBLE_EPSILON        1E-8    /* smallest number X s.t. 1+X<>X */
00131 #define C_DOUBLE_MAX            1E+37
00132 #define C_DOUBLE_MIN            1E-37

00242 /*
00243  *      Description     :       File operations.
00244  */
00245 typedef int C_File;
00246 
00247 #define C_STDIN         0       /* standard input */
00248 #define C_STDOUT        1       /* standard output */
00249 #define C_STDERR        2       /* standard error output */
00250 
00251 /*
00252  *      QUERY OPERATIONS
00253  */
00254 typedef struct
00255 {
00256   short does_not_exist;         /* no such named file */
00257   short search_denied;          /* no permission to search */
00258   short is_regular_file;        /* is a regular file? */
00259   long last_access_time;        /* last use/modify time */
00260   long last_modify_time;        /* last modify time */
00261   long total_size;              /* total size in bytes */
00262   int owner_id;                 /* user ID of owner */
00263 }
00264 C_Fstat;
